stories.original_summary: Scientists have found compelling new evidence that humans, not glaciers, brought Stonehenge’s bluestones to the site. stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Unravel Ancient Secret of the Standing Stones!
stories.fantasy_story: Royal Alchemists have unearthed compelling new evidence about the grand Standing Stones. Their latest divinations suggest that ancient folk, not mighty ice giants, moved the colossal bluestones to their sacred circle. The land holds no trace of glacial magic, pointing to the incredible strength of the ancestors.

stories.fantasy_headline: Scholar-Wizards Uncover Secrets of Petrified Sea Creatures!
stories.fantasy_story: Renowned Scholar-Wizards have finally deciphered the enigma of the strange ancient imprints found in the deep earth. These soft-bodied sea creatures, thought impossible to preserve, were protected by unusual enchantments in the ancient ocean's waters. This rare ocean magic formed earthen seals around them, preserving their forms for ages.

stories.fantasy_headline: New Spell Allows Grand Vision-Weavers to Animate Memories!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Guild of Vision-Weavers has revealed a powerful new enchantment for the Scrying Pool of Images. Those who gaze into it can now speak specific charms, dictating how their still images will move and swirl. This grants them greater control over the animated visions, bringing their memories to vivid, magical life.

stories.fantasy_headline: The Clan of Rhythms Unveils Ultimate Percussion Golem!
stories.fantasy_story: The venerable Clan of Rhythms has finally gifted the realm with a magnificent new artifact: the Percussion Golem of a Thousand Beats. This mechanical marvel is a true successor to the legendary Eight-O-Eight, whose deep booming heartbeat is woven into the very fabric of all minstrels' tunes. Bards and troubadours across the land rejoice at its powerful, enchanting rhythms.
